title: What do Championship Jewels do?
body: What are Championship Jewels, what do they do and how do I use them? I just got 2 from that 150IP thing in the store

replies.body:
This link explains it: http://www.idigitaltimes.com/league-legends-world-championship-icons-how-upgrade-tier-two-and-three-558584

Hope it helps :D
You use them to upgrade team icons & the worlds icon to gold!
